creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
This has been removed in 1.4 for consistency reasons. There is no document which
represents this node. But recently there was a discussion on lenya-dev to
introduce a mandatory top level document.

we should really re-introduce this root page. its absence leads to major
inconsistencies in the gui:

* you cannot paste first-level documents from the clipboard
* you cannot "publish whole subtree" for the entire tree

additionally, many pieces of code currently assume that it's safe to jump back
to the "index" page after finishing a usecase, but this page can be deleted by
users, which makes the gui pretty much ununsable. the first page created (which
gets the "index" id) should not have these extra hidden semantics attached to it...
